headline: The Prompting Primer and the Conversation that got it
description: An exploration of prompting as a literacy and collaborative art, framed through the Prompting Triad (Ground, Frame, Cut) and a Socratic dialogue. Written as part of Totem Current — experiments and tools that push the edges of practice.
whyItMatters: This post codifies prompting as more than a trick or hack—it frames it as a literacy that will define human-AI collaboration, showing how process can be shaped as much as content. It belongs to Totem Current because it embodies tool-making and experiment in living practice.
articleExcerpt: Prompting isn’t just about better answers—it’s about designing conditions where insight can emerge. The Prompting Triad (Ground, Frame, Cut) and the idea of meta-prompting frame this as a literacy of the future.
sourceFragments: The Prompting Triad: Ground (corpus awareness), Frame (transformer awareness), Cut (token awareness).
Prompting as literacy: not trickery, but design.
Meta-prompting: shaping not just content, but the process itself.
